mapper.select: SELECT TAKESEQ, TO_CHAR(RECEIPTDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') RECEIPTDATE, AUTONUMBER, CUSTOMER_AUTOKIND, CUSTOMER_NAME, FN_LEADTIME_NAME(REPAIRCODE, 'NAME') REPAIRCODE_NAME, FN_CODENAME(POSITION, 'AUTO_ROOM') POSITION_NAME, ESTIME, FN_CODENAME(REPAIRMETHOD, 'AUTO_ME') REPAIRMETHOD_NAME, FN_CODENAME(TASKSTAT, 'AUTO_PROC') TASKSTAT_NAME FROM CAR_TAKEREPAIR A, CAR_CUSTOMER B WHERE A.CUSTOMER_ID = B.CUSTOMER_ID
